hero.subtitle: A simple, sustainable coconut ecosystem — from farmers to global products.

about.title: What We Do
about.description: COMONDO is building a comprehensive coconut ecosystem—transforming every part of the coconut into valuable products for global markets

what.fullUtilization_desc: We extract value from every part of the coconut—from meat and water to shell and fiber—minimizing waste and maximizing sustainability
what.greenEconomy_desc: Building regenerative supply chains that empower local farmers while delivering premium products to conscious consumers worldwide
what.innovation_desc: Combining traditional coconut wisdom with modern technology to create next-generation products for diverse industries

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.mission_text: Turn every coconut into value — with zero waste and positive impact.
mission.vision_text: Build the world’s most trusted coconut brand for a greener economy.

impact.title: Impact & Sustainability
impact.description: Aligned with the UN Sustainable Development Goals, we're building a business that creates positive change

advantage.title: The COMONDO Advantage
advantage.description: Why investors and partners choose to build the coconut economy with us

stats.indonesia_rank: Indonesia Global Rank of Coconut Producers

social.title: Social
social.desc: Fair trade partnerships with local farmers.

full_value_chain.title: Full Value Chain
full_value_chain.desc: From farm to product — quality at every step.

scalable_model.title: Scalable Model
scalable_model.desc: Built to scale — processes and partnerships.

products.title: KOKO Santan
products.description: Premium fresh coconut cream that started our journey—setting new standards for quality and freshness

contact.title: Join the Coconut Revolution
contact.subtitle: Whether you're an investor, partner, or coconut enthusiast—there's a place for you in the COMONDO ecosystem
contact.investors_desc: Explore opportunities in the growing coconut economy
contact.partners_desc: Collaborate on coconut innovation and distribution
contact.ready_text: Get in touch with our team to explore how COMONDO can create value for you

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Comondo — The Coconut World: elevating coconuts from commodity to innovation.

who.title: Who We Are
who.body: Comondo stands for 'The Coconut World.' We believe Indonesia's coconuts deserve to be elevated — not just as raw commodities, but as valuable innovations that feed the world.

story.title: Our Story
story.body: What began as a quest to create fresher, cleaner coconut cream has evolved into a mission to build an integrated ecosystem connecting farmers, technology, and global buyers.

about.cta_body: Partner with us to grow a sustainable, transparent coconut economy that benefits farmers and customers alike.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: A family of products powered by a single ecosystem — quality, traceability, and scale.

partner.title: Partner With Us
partner.subtitle: We collaborate with investors, distributors, manufacturers and communities to build the coconut economy.
partner.investors_body: Join our journey toward a full-stack coconut ecosystem — from production to digital innovation.
partner.businesses_body: Source sustainable, high-quality coconut products or collaborate on distribution and technology.
partner.communities_body: Be part of our sustainable supply and training programs.
